Name: Curiosity
About the game: 'Curiosity killed the cat ...' - says the main character of this story and 'come between the bark and the tree', because he knows that '... satisfaction brought it back.' He knows a lot of idioms and doesn't believe in omens. He don't gift you adversity or failure, when he crosses your road, but just living its life. Curiosity can bring you back ... or not. Would you like to check it? This story is full of funny and sad moments. In some places, it is able to bring a smile or tears. Your choice will determine the fate of the protagonist and only you decide how this story will end. The main character of the story is a black cat. He has own character, opinion and truly 'feline' point of view on everything that happens in his life. The genre of this game is a visual novel, an interesting story with images and a pleasant soundtrack, in which you are able to influence the plot. The game has several puzzles for greater immersion.
